short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture
description: Transport Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Edmonton, Alberta
duration_in_months: If it is bid on now (January, 2024) the bid will last 6 months
full_summary:
=====================================

**Office Furniture Purchase**
-----------------------------

### Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** |
| --- | --- |
| **Procurement Number (Référence Procédure)** | T8080-230395-1 |
| **Purchase Description (Description Produits)** | Office furniture to support Transport Canada operations |
| **Due Date for Submission of Tender (Date Soumission Offres)** | January 9, 2024 15:00:00 |
| **Expected Start Date (Date de démarrage prévue)** | January 12, 2024 |
| **Expected End Date (Date de fin prévue)** | August 30, 2024 |

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method (Méthode Procédure)**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Budget Fund** (Budget): N/A
* **Evaluation Criteria (Critères d'évaluation)**: As per procurement documents

### Notice Type

* **Notice Type (Type d'avis)**: Request for Proposal

### Financial Information
 Fritz

* **Trade Agreements (Accords Commerciaux)**: Various Trade Agreements including Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement

### Purchaser Location
* **Contractor Address (Adresse Contratant)** | 344 Edmonton St. Winnipeg, MB R3B 2L4, Canada
* **End User Address (Adresse utilisateur)** | None

### Contact
* **Contact Name (Nom Pendule)** | Cory Lajoie
* **Contact Email (Courriel Conctact)** | [cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca](mailto:cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone (Téléphone )** | 204-228-2267
